snippet: Two former MF Global employees have told federal investigators they raised concerns about the firm’s use of customer money in the final week before the firm’s bankruptcy filing.
abstract: Two former MF Global employees have told federal investigators they raised concerns about the firm’s use of customer money in the final week before the firm’s bankruptcy filing.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and AZAM AHMED

headline.main: Red Flags Were Raised on Client Cash, MF Global Inquiry Is Told
headline.print_headline: Red Flags Were Raised on Client Cash, MF Global Inquiry Is Told
